answerText: Gibran Khalil Gibran [10] In this aforementioned masterpiece of Gibran, Almitra urges the title character to talk about random things like love and death.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of Pittsburgh A and Walter Johnson High School | 10 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man's early works like Spirits Rebellious and The Broken Wings were in Arabic, but he is best known for writing about the people of Orphalese listening to Almustafa.  [10] Who is this poet of Sand and Foam and The Earth Gods?
